short_description: FRONT LAPTOP COMPARTMENT FOR BUSINESS: Designed as a premium carry on luggage for professionals. Designed for frequent travel, the high-density PC body is impact-resistant and water-resistant, ensuring your laptop and valuables stay dry even on rainy days. Unlike standard plastic suitcases, it flexes under pressure to prevent cracking. The textured shell is extremely scratch-resistant and has passed the shock drop test for long-lasting durability.

SUPERIOR MANEUVERABILITY: The rolling suitcase features smooth 360° silent swivel wheels that are durable on cobblestone or carpet. It has a sturdy, smooth, three-level adjustable aluminium handle. Soft silicone handles on the top and sides make this lightweight suitcase easy to lift into overhead bins.
